text: Egh kamaghɨn Hesekia mɨkɨm: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨkeme: Kɨ nɨ ateghtɨ, nɨ 15plan azenibar ua ikegh gɨn aremegham. Kɨ uaghan nɨn akuragh, egh Asiriabar atrivimɨn amamangatɨghan koghtɨ, a nɨ abɨraghan kogh Jerusalem inighan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham. Kɨ uan akar dɨkɨrɨzir kɨ fomɨra uan ingangarir gumazim Devit ko amizim gɨnɨghnɨgha kamaghɨn damuasa.”
